issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
Hi Baila,

That one is probably not ideal because it has commands to download the models; which you don’t need in your solution. I suggest you use the one in the [subt\_seed repo](#!/osrf/subt_seed/src/default/docker/subt_solution/Dockerfile) as starting point reference. I’d use it like this \(just an idea\):

```
$ mkdir -p ~/subt_solution/src && cd ~/subt_solution/src

$ hg clone #!/osrf/subt_seed

$ cd ~/subt_solution
```

Then, I copy all my solution code into the [/src](#!/osrf/subt_seed/src/default/src/) directory

Modify the [Dockerfile](#!/osrf/subt_seed/src/default/docker/subt_solution/Dockerfile) to install the packages required by my solution.

Build my solution docker image using the [build.bash](#!/osrf/subt_seed/src/default/docker/build.bash) script.

```
./build.bash subt_solution --no-cache
```

I hope this helps.
